text: Alice Lake (September 12, 1895 â€“ November 15, 1967) was an American movie actress. She was particularly popular in the silent era. She played A Fair Customer in the movie The Waiters' Ball in 1916. She also played Jean Oliver in The Hole in the Wall. Lake was born in Brooklyn, New York. She died of a heart attack in Hollywood, Los Angeles, California at age 71. == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:1895 births Category:1967 deaths
title: Alice Lake
